Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Junk
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A junk ship is a traditional sailing vessel known for its unique design, featuring a high stern and a flat bottom. It often employs multiple sails and was historically used for various maritime activities such as trade, fishing, and transportation.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Helmsman x1, Passenger x3
